li.label: pacifist
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a pacifist - of a sort. [PAWN_pronoun]'s far, far less likely to start a social fight, but this doesn't mean [PAWN_pronoun] won't defend his friends from harm. [PAWN_possessive] relative pacifism only has a minor effect on [PAWN_possessive] combat ability,
